00176 //----------------------------------------------------------
00177 MMat4x4::MMat4x4( const MMat3x3& rot, const MVec3& translation, const MVec3& scale )
00178 {
00180         GetAlignedPtr();
00181 
00183         _data[ 0 ] = scale.GetX() * rot( 0, 0 );
00184         _data[ 1 ] = scale.GetX() * rot( 0, 1 );
00185         _data[ 2 ] = scale.GetX() * rot( 0, 2 );
00186         _data[ 3 ] = translation.GetX();
00187 
00188         _data[ 4 ] = scale.GetY() * rot( 1, 0 );
00189         _data[ 5 ] = scale.GetY() * rot( 1, 1 );
00190         _data[ 6 ] = scale.GetY() * rot( 1, 2 );
00191         _data[ 7 ] = translation.GetY();
00192 
00193         _data[ 8 ] = scale.GetZ() * rot( 2, 0 );
00194         _data[ 9 ] = scale.GetZ() * rot( 2, 1 );
00195         _data[ 10 ] = scale.GetZ() * rot( 2, 2 );
00196         _data[ 11 ] = translation.GetZ();
00197 
00198         _data[ 12 ] = 0.0f;
00199         _data[ 13 ] = 0.0f;
00200         _data[ 14 ] = 0.0f;
00201         _data[ 15 ] = 1.0f;
00202 }

00239 MMat4x4::MMat4x4( const float* mat )
00240 {
00242         MemSet( _array, 0, sizeof( _array ) );
00243 
00245         GetAlignedPtr();
00246 
00248         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 16; ++i )
00249                 _data[ i ] = mat[ i ];
00250 }

00279 //----------------------------------------------------------
00280 bool
00281 MMat4x4::Inverse( MMat4x4& output ) const
00282 {
00284         float tmp[ 12 ];
00285         float src[ 16 ];
00286         float det;
00287 
00289         for ( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i ) {
00290                 src[ i ] = _data[ 4 * i ];
00291                 src[ i + 4 ] = _data[ 4 * i + 1 ];
00292                 src[ i + 8 ] = _data[ 4 * i + 2 ];
00293                 src[ i + 12 ] = _data[ 4 * i + 3 ];
00294         }
00295 
00297         tmp[ 0 ] = src[ 10 ] * src[ 15 ];
00298         tmp[ 1 ] = src[ 11 ] * src[ 14 ];
00299         tmp[ 2 ] = src[ 9 ] * src[ 15 ];
00300         tmp[ 3 ] = src[ 11 ] * src[ 13 ];
00301         tmp[ 4 ] = src[ 9 ] * src[ 14 ];
00302         tmp[ 5 ] = src[ 10 ] * src[ 13 ];
00303         tmp[ 6 ] = src[ 8 ] * src[ 15 ];
00304         tmp[ 7 ] = src[ 11 ] * src[ 12 ];
00305         tmp[ 8 ] = src[ 8 ] * src[ 14 ];
00306         tmp[ 9 ] = src[ 10 ] * src[ 12 ];
00307         tmp[ 10 ] = src[ 8 ] * src[ 13 ];
00308         tmp[ 11 ] = src[ 9 ] * src[ 12 ];
00309 
00311         float dst[ 16 ];
00312 
00313         dst[ 0 ] =  tmp[ 0 ] * src[ 5 ] + tmp[ 3 ] * src[ 6 ] + tmp[ 4 ] * src[ 7 ];
00314         dst[ 0 ] -= tmp[ 1 ] * src[ 5 ] + tmp[ 2 ] * src[ 6 ] + tmp[ 5 ] * src[ 7 ];
00315         dst[ 1 ] =  tmp[ 1 ] * src[ 4 ] + tmp[ 6 ] * src[ 6 ] + tmp[ 9 ] * src[ 7 ];
00316         dst[ 1 ] -= tmp[ 0 ] * src[ 4 ] + tmp[ 7 ] * src[ 6 ] + tmp[ 8 ] * src[ 7 ];
00317         dst[ 2 ] =  tmp[ 2 ] * src[ 4 ] + tmp[ 7 ] * src[ 5 ] + tmp[ 10 ] * src[ 7 ];
00318         dst[ 2 ] -= tmp[ 3 ] * src[ 4 ] + tmp[ 6 ] * src[ 5 ] + tmp[ 11 ] * src[ 7 ];
00319         dst[ 3 ] =  tmp[ 5 ] * src[ 4 ] + tmp[ 8 ] * src[ 5 ] + tmp[ 11 ] * src[ 6 ];
00320         dst[ 3 ] -= tmp[ 4 ] * src[ 4 ] + tmp[ 9 ] * src[ 5 ] + tmp[ 10 ] * src[ 6 ];
00321         dst[ 4 ] =  tmp[ 1 ] * src[ 1 ] + tmp[ 2 ] * src[ 2 ] + tmp[ 5 ] * src[ 3 ];
00322         dst[ 4 ] -= tmp[ 0 ] * src[ 1 ] + tmp[ 3 ] * src[ 2 ] + tmp[ 4 ] * src[ 3 ];
00323         dst[ 5 ] =  tmp[ 0 ] * src[ 0 ] + tmp[ 7 ] * src[ 2 ] + tmp[ 8 ] * src[ 3 ];
00324         dst[ 5 ] -= tmp[ 1 ] * src[ 0 ] + tmp[ 6 ] * src[ 2 ] + tmp[ 9 ] * src[ 3 ];
00325         dst[ 6 ] =  tmp[ 3 ] * src[ 0 ] + tmp[ 6 ] * src[ 1 ] + tmp[ 11 ] * src[ 3 ];
00326         dst[ 6 ] -= tmp[ 2 ] * src[ 0 ] + tmp[ 7 ] * src[ 1 ] + tmp[ 10 ] * src[ 3 ];
00327         dst[ 7 ] =  tmp[ 4 ] * src[ 0 ] + tmp[ 9 ] * src[ 1 ] + tmp[ 10 ] * src[ 2 ];
00328         dst[ 7 ] -= tmp[ 5 ] * src[ 0 ] + tmp[ 8 ] * src[ 1 ] + tmp[ 11 ] * src[ 2 ];
00329 
00331         tmp[ 0 ] = src[ 2 ] * src[ 7 ];
00332         tmp[ 1 ] = src[ 3 ] * src[ 6 ];
00333         tmp[ 2 ] = src[ 1 ] * src[ 7 ];
00334         tmp[ 3 ] = src[ 3 ] * src[ 5 ];
00335         tmp[ 4 ] = src[ 1 ] * src[ 6 ];
00336         tmp[ 5 ] = src[ 2 ] * src[ 5 ];
00337         tmp[ 6 ] = src[ 0 ] * src[ 7 ];
00338         tmp[ 7 ] = src[ 3 ] * src[ 4 ];
00339         tmp[ 8 ] = src[ 0 ] * src[ 6 ];
00340         tmp[ 9 ] = src[ 2 ] * src[ 4 ];
00341         tmp[ 10 ] = src[ 0 ] * src[ 5 ];
00342         tmp[ 11 ] = src[ 1 ] * src[ 4 ];
00343 
00345         dst[ 8 ] =  tmp[ 0 ] * src[ 13 ] + tmp[ 3 ] * src[ 14 ] + tmp[ 4 ] * src[ 15 ];
00346         dst[ 8 ] -= tmp[ 1 ] * src[ 13 ] + tmp[ 2 ] * src[ 14 ] + tmp[ 5 ] * src[ 15 ];
00347         dst[ 9 ] =  tmp[ 1 ] * src[ 12 ] + tmp[ 6 ] * src[ 14 ] + tmp[ 9 ] * src[ 15 ];
00348         dst[ 9 ] -= tmp[ 0 ] * src[ 12 ] + tmp[ 7 ] * src[ 14 ] + tmp[ 8 ] * src[ 15 ];
00349         dst[ 10 ] =  tmp[ 2 ] * src[ 12 ] + tmp[ 7 ] * src[ 13 ] + tmp[ 10 ] * src[ 15 ];
00350         dst[ 10 ] -= tmp[ 3 ] * src[ 12 ] + tmp[ 6 ] * src[ 13 ] + tmp[ 11 ] * src[ 15 ];
00351         dst[ 11 ] =  tmp[ 5 ] * src[ 12 ] + tmp[ 8 ] * src[ 13 ] + tmp[ 11 ] * src[ 14 ];
00352         dst[ 11 ] -= tmp[ 4 ] * src[ 12 ] + tmp[ 9 ] * src[ 13 ] + tmp[ 10 ] * src[ 14 ];
00353         dst[ 12 ] =  tmp[ 2 ] * src[ 10 ] + tmp[ 5 ] * src[ 11 ] + tmp[ 1 ] * src[ 9 ];
00354         dst[ 12 ] -= tmp[ 4 ] * src[ 11 ] + tmp[ 0 ] * src[ 9 ] + tmp[ 3 ] * src[ 10 ];
00355         dst[ 13 ] =  tmp[ 8 ] * src[ 11 ] + tmp[ 0 ] * src[ 8 ] + tmp[ 7 ] * src[ 10 ];
00356         dst[ 13 ] -= tmp[ 6 ] * src[ 10 ] + tmp[ 9 ] * src[ 11 ] + tmp[ 1 ] * src[ 8 ];
00357         dst[ 14 ] =  tmp[ 6 ] * src[ 9 ] + tmp[ 11 ] * src[ 11 ] + tmp[ 3 ] * src[ 8 ];
00358         dst[ 14 ] -= tmp[ 10 ] * src[ 11 ] + tmp[ 2 ] * src[ 8 ] + tmp[ 7 ] * src[ 9 ];
00359         dst[ 15 ] =  tmp[ 10 ] * src[ 10 ] + tmp[ 4 ] * src[ 8 ] + tmp[ 9 ] * src[ 9 ];
00360         dst[ 15 ] -= tmp[ 8 ] * src[ 9 ] + tmp[ 11 ] * src[ 10 ] + tmp[ 5 ] * src[ 8 ];
00361 
00363         det = src[ 0 ] * dst[ 0 ] + src[ 1 ] * dst[ 1 ] + src[ 2 ] * dst[ 2 ] + src[ 3 ] * dst[ 3 ];
00364         if ( Abs( det ) < kInverseDetEpsilon )
00365                 return false;
00366 
00368         det = 1 / det;
00369 
00371         output = MMat4x4( dst[ 0 ] * det, dst[ 1 ] * det, dst[ 2 ] * det, dst[ 3 ] * det,
00372                                         dst[ 4 ] * det, dst[ 5 ] * det, dst[ 6 ] * det, dst[ 7 ] * det,
00373                                         dst[ 8 ] * det, dst[ 9 ] * det, dst[ 10 ] * det, dst[ 11 ] * det,
00374                                         dst[ 12 ] * det, dst[ 13 ] * det, dst[ 14 ] * det, dst[ 15 ] * det );
00375 
00376         return true;
00377 }

00379 //----------------------------------------------------------
00380 void
00381 MMat4x4::Transpose() const
00382 {
00383         Swap( _data[ 1 ], _data[ 4 ] );
00384         Swap( _data[ 2 ], _data[ 8 ] );
00385         Swap( _data[ 3 ], _data[ 12 ] );
00386         Swap( _data[ 6 ], _data[ 9 ] );
00387         Swap( _data[ 7 ], _data[ 13 ] );
00388         Swap( _data[ 11 ], _data[ 14 ] );
00389 }

00391 //----------------------------------------------------------
00392 MMat4x4
00393 MMat4x4::Transposed() const
00394 {
00396         MMat4x4 newMat( *this );
00397         newMat.Transpose();
00398         return newMat;
00399 }

00401 //----------------------------------------------------------
00402 void
00403 MMat4x4::TransformCoordFast( MVec3& coord ) const
00404 {
00405         float x = _data[ 0 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 1 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 2 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 3 ];
00406         float y = _data[ 4 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 5 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 6 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 7 ];
00407         float z = _data[ 8 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 9 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 10 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 11 ];
00408         float invW = 1.0f / ( _data[ 12 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 13 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 14 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 15 ] );
00409         coord.SetX( x*invW );
00410         coord.SetY( y*invW );
00411         coord.SetZ( z*invW );
00412 }
00413 
00414 //----------------------------------------------------------
00415 MVec3
00416 MMat4x4::TransformCoord( const MVec3& coord ) const
00417 {
00418         float x = _data[ 0 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 1 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 2 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 3 ];
00419         float y = _data[ 4 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 5 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 6 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 7 ];
00420         float z = _data[ 8 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 9 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 10 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 11 ];
00421         float invW = 1.0f / ( _data[ 12 ]*coord.GetX() + _data[ 13 ]*coord.GetY() + _data[ 14 ]*coord.GetZ() + _data[ 15 ] );
00422         return MVec3( x * invW, y * invW, z * invW );
00423 }
00424 
00425 //----------------------------------------------------------
00426 void
00427 MMat4x4::TransformCoordPrePersp( MVec4& result, const MVec3& coord ) const
00428 {
00429         result.SetX( _data[ 0 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 1 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 2 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 3 ] );
00430         result.SetY( _data[ 4 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 5 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 6 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 7 ] );
00431         result.SetZ( _data[ 8 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 9 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 10 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 11 ] );
00432         result.SetW( _data[ 12 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 13 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 14 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 15 ] );
00433 }
00434 
00435 //----------------------------------------------------------
00436 MVec3
00437 MMat4x4::TransformCoordNoPersp( const MVec3& coord ) const
00438 {
00439         float x = _data[ 0 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 1 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 2 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 3 ];
00440         float y = _data[ 4 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 5 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 6 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 7 ];
00441         float z = _data[ 8 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 9 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 10 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 11 ];
00442         return MVec3( x, y, z );
00443 }

00445 //----------------------------------------------------------
00446 void
00447 MMat4x4::TransformCoordNoPerspFast( MVec3& coord ) const
00448 {
00449         float x = _data[ 0 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 1 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 2 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 3 ];
00450         float y = _data[ 4 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 5 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 6 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 7 ];
00451         float z = _data[ 8 ] * coord.GetX() + _data[ 9 ] * coord.GetY() + _data[ 10 ] * coord.GetZ() + _data[ 11 ];
00452         coord.SetX( x );
00453         coord.SetY( y );
00454         coord.SetZ( z );

00457 //----------------------------------------------------------
00458 void
00459 MMat4x4::SetRotate( const MMat3x3& rot )
00460 {
00461         MVec3 scale = GetScale();
00462         _data[ 0 ]  = scale.GetX() * rot( 0, 0 );
00463         _data[ 1 ]  = scale.GetX() * rot( 0, 1 );
00464         _data[ 2 ]  = scale.GetX() * rot( 0, 2 );
00465         _data[ 4 ]  = scale.GetY() * rot( 1, 0 );
00466         _data[ 5 ]  = scale.GetY() * rot( 1, 1 );
00467         _data[ 6 ]  = scale.GetY() * rot( 1, 2 );
00468         _data[ 8 ]  = scale.GetZ() * rot( 2, 0 );
00469         _data[ 9 ]  = scale.GetZ() * rot( 2, 1 );
00470         _data[ 10 ] = scale.GetZ() * rot( 2, 2 );
00471 }

00473 //----------------------------------------------------------
00474 void
00475 MMat4x4::SetTranslate( const MVec3& pos )
00476 {
00477         _data[ 3 ] = pos.GetX();
00478         _data[ 7 ] = pos.GetY();
00479         _data[ 11 ] = pos.GetZ();
00480 }
00481 
00482 //----------------------------------------------------------
00483 void
00484 MMat4x4::GetRotate( MMat3x3& mat ) const
00485 {
00486         float xInvScale = InvSqrtFast( _data[ 0 ]*_data[ 0 ] + _data[ 1 ]*_data[ 1 ] + _data[ 2 ]*_data[ 2 ] );
00487         float yInvScale = InvSqrtFast( _data[ 4 ]*_data[ 4 ] + _data[ 5 ]*_data[ 5 ] + _data[ 6 ]*_data[ 6 ] );
00488         float zInvScale = InvSqrtFast( _data[ 8 ]*_data[ 8 ] + _data[ 9 ]*_data[ 9 ] + _data[ 10 ]*_data[ 10 ] );
00489 
00490         mat( 0,0 ) = xInvScale*_data[ 0 ];
00491         mat( 0,1 ) = xInvScale*_data[ 1 ];
00492         mat( 0,2 ) = xInvScale*_data[ 2 ];
00493 
00494         mat( 1,0 ) = yInvScale*_data[ 4 ];
00495         mat( 1,1 ) = yInvScale*_data[ 5 ];
00496         mat( 1,2 ) = yInvScale*_data[ 6 ];
00497 
00498         mat( 2,0 ) = zInvScale*_data[ 8 ];
00499         mat( 2,1 ) = zInvScale*_data[ 9 ];
00500         mat( 2,2 ) = zInvScale*_data[ 10 ];
00501 }
00502 
00503 //----------------------------------------------------------
00504 MMat3x3
00505 MMat4x4::GetRotate() const
00506 {
00507         float xInvScale = InvSqrtFast( _data[ 0 ]*_data[ 0 ] + _data[ 1 ]*_data[ 1 ] + _data[ 2 ]*_data[ 2 ] );
00508         float yInvScale = InvSqrtFast( _data[ 4 ]*_data[ 4 ] + _data[ 5 ]*_data[ 5 ] + _data[ 6 ]*_data[ 6 ] );
00509         float zInvScale = InvSqrtFast( _data[ 8 ]*_data[ 8 ] + _data[ 9 ]*_data[ 9 ] + _data[ 10 ]*_data[ 10 ] );
00510         return MMat3x3( xInvScale*_data[ 0 ], xInvScale*_data[ 1 ], xInvScale*_data[ 2 ],
00511                                     yInvScale*_data[ 4 ], yInvScale*_data[ 5 ], yInvScale*_data[ 6 ],
00512                                     zInvScale*_data[ 8 ], zInvScale*_data[ 9 ], zInvScale*_data[ 10 ] );
00513 }
00514

00520         pos.SetY( _data[ 7 ] );

00531 //----------------------------------------------------------
00532 void
00533 MMat4x4::GetScaleSqr( MVec3& scale ) const
00534 {
00536         MVec3 x( _data[ 0 ], _data[ 1 ], _data[ 2 ] );
00537         MVec3 y( _data[ 4 ], _data[ 5 ], _data[ 6 ] );
00538         MVec3 z( _data[ 8 ], _data[ 9 ], _data[ 10 ] );
00539 
00541         scale.SetX( x.MagSqr() );
00542         scale.SetY( y.MagSqr() );
00543         scale.SetZ( z.MagSqr() );
00544 }
00545 
00546 //----------------------------------------------------------
00547 MVec3
00548 MMat4x4::GetScaleSqr() const
00549 {
00551         MVec3 x( _data[ 0 ], _data[ 1 ], _data[ 2 ] );
00552         MVec3 y( _data[ 4 ], _data[ 5 ], _data[ 6 ] );
00553         MVec3 z( _data[ 8 ], _data[ 9 ], _data[ 10 ] );
00554 
00556         return MVec3( x.MagSqr(), y.MagSqr(), z.MagSqr() );
00557 }
00558 
00559 //----------------------------------------------------------
00560 void
00561 MMat4x4::GetScale( MVec3& scale ) const
00562 {
00564         MVec3 x( _data[ 0 ], _data[ 1 ], _data[ 2 ] );
00565         MVec3 y( _data[ 4 ], _data[ 5 ], _data[ 6 ] );
00566         MVec3 z( _data[ 8 ], _data[ 9 ], _data[ 10 ] );
00567 
00569         scale.SetX( x.Mag() );
00570         scale.SetY( y.Mag() );
00571         scale.SetZ( z.Mag() );
00572 }
00573 
00574 //----------------------------------------------------------
00575 MVec3
00576 MMat4x4::GetScale() const
00577 {
00579         MVec3 x( _data[ 0 ], _data[ 1 ], _data[ 2 ] );
00580         MVec3 y( _data[ 4 ], _data[ 5 ], _data[ 6 ] );
00581         MVec3 z( _data[ 8 ], _data[ 9 ], _data[ 10 ] );
00582 
00584         return MVec3( x.Mag(), y.Mag(), z.Mag() );
00585 }

00587 //----------------------------------------------------------
00588 void 
00589 MMat4x4::SetAxes( const MVec3& x, const MVec3& y, const MVec3& z )
00590 {
00591         _data[ 0 ] = x.GetX();
00592         _data[ 1 ] = x.GetY();
00593         _data[ 2 ] = x.GetZ();
00594         _data[ 4 ] = y.GetX();
00595         _data[ 5 ] = y.GetY();
00596         _data[ 6 ] = y.GetZ();
00597         _data[ 8 ] = z.GetX();
00598         _data[ 9 ] = z.GetY();
00599         _data[ 10 ] = z.GetZ();
00600 }
00601 
00602 //----------------------------------------------------------
00603 void
00604 MMat4x4::SetScale( const MVec3& scale )
00605 {
00607         MVec3 x( _data[ 0 ], _data[ 1 ], _data[ 2 ] );
00608         MVec3 y( _data[ 4 ], _data[ 5 ], _data[ 6 ] );
00609         MVec3 z( _data[ 8 ], _data[ 9 ], _data[ 10 ] );
00610         x.Normalize();
00611         y.Normalize();
00612         z.Normalize();
00613         x *= scale.GetX();
00614         y *= scale.GetY();
00615         z *= scale.GetZ();
00616         SetAxes( x, y, z );
00617 }
00618 
00619 //----------------------------------------------------------
00620 void
00621 MMat4x4::SetOrientation( const MVec3& side, const MVec3& forward )
00622 {
00624     MVec3 x( side.Normalized() );
00625     MVec3 z( forward.Normalized() );
00626     MVec3 y( z.Cross( x ).Normalized() );
00627     x = y.Cross( z ).Normalized();
00628 
00630         MVec3 scale = GetScale();
00631         x *= scale.GetX();
00632         y *= scale.GetY();
00633         z *= scale.GetZ();
00634 
00636         SetAxes( x, y, z );
00637 }

00647         dst[ 2 ] = rowVec.GetZ();
00648         dst[ 3 ] = rowVec.GetW();

00734 //----------------------------------------------------------
00736 MMat4x4
00737 MMat4x4::operator * ( const MMat4x4& mat ) const
00738 {
00739 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00740         MMat4x4 d;
00741 
00743         float *data1Ptr = _data;
00744         float *data2Ptr = mat._data;
00745         float *output = d._data;
00746         __asm
00747         {
00749                 mov eax, data1Ptr;
00750                 mov ebx, data2Ptr;
00751                 mov edx, output;
00752 
00754                 movaps xmm1, [ ebx ];
00755                 movaps xmm3, [ ebx+16 ];
00756                 movaps xmm5, [ ebx+32 ];
00757                 movaps xmm7, [ ebx+48 ];
00758 
00761                 movaps xmm0, [ eax ];                   
00762                 movaps xmm6, xmm0;
00763                 movaps xmm4, xmm0;
00764                 movaps xmm2, xmm0;
00765                 shufps xmm6, xmm6, 0xFF;
00766                 shufps xmm4, xmm4, 0xAA;
00767                 shufps xmm2, xmm2, 0x55;
00768                 shufps xmm0, xmm0, 0x00;        
00769 
00771                 mulps xmm0, xmm1;                       
00772                 mulps xmm2, xmm3;                       
00773                 mulps xmm4, xmm5;                       
00774                 mulps xmm6, xmm7;                       
00775                 addps xmm0, xmm2;
00776                 addps xmm0, xmm4;
00777                 addps xmm0, xmm6;       
00778 
00780                 movaps [ edx ], xmm0;
00781 
00784                 movaps xmm0, [ eax+16 ];                        
00785                 movaps xmm6, xmm0;
00786                 movaps xmm4, xmm0;
00787                 movaps xmm2, xmm0;
00788                 shufps xmm6, xmm6, 0xFF;
00789                 shufps xmm4, xmm4, 0xAA;
00790                 shufps xmm2, xmm2, 0x55;
00791                 shufps xmm0, xmm0, 0x00;        
00792 
00794                 mulps xmm0, xmm1;                       
00795                 mulps xmm2, xmm3;                       
00796                 mulps xmm4, xmm5;                       
00797                 mulps xmm6, xmm7;                       
00798                 addps xmm0, xmm2;
00799                 addps xmm0, xmm4;
00800                 addps xmm0, xmm6;       
00801 
00803                 movaps [ edx+16 ], xmm0;
00804 
00807                 movaps xmm0, [ eax+32 ];                        
00808                 movaps xmm6, xmm0;
00809                 movaps xmm4, xmm0;
00810                 movaps xmm2, xmm0;
00811                 shufps xmm6, xmm6, 0xFF;
00812                 shufps xmm4, xmm4, 0xAA;
00813                 shufps xmm2, xmm2, 0x55;
00814                 shufps xmm0, xmm0, 0x00;        
00815 
00817                 mulps xmm0, xmm1;                       
00818                 mulps xmm2, xmm3;                       
00819                 mulps xmm4, xmm5;                       
00820                 mulps xmm6, xmm7;                       
00821                 addps xmm0, xmm2;
00822                 addps xmm0, xmm4;
00823                 addps xmm0, xmm6;       
00824 
00826                 movaps [ edx+32 ], xmm0;
00827 
00830                 movaps xmm0, [ eax+48 ];                        
00831                 movaps xmm6, xmm0;
00832                 movaps xmm4, xmm0;
00833                 movaps xmm2, xmm0;
00834                 shufps xmm6, xmm6, 0xFF;
00835                 shufps xmm4, xmm4, 0xAA;
00836                 shufps xmm2, xmm2, 0x55;
00837                 shufps xmm0, xmm0, 0x00;        
00838 
00840                 mulps xmm0, xmm1;                       
00841                 mulps xmm2, xmm3;                       
00842                 mulps xmm4, xmm5;                       
00843                 mulps xmm6, xmm7;                       
00844                 addps xmm0, xmm2;
00845                 addps xmm0, xmm4;
00846                 addps xmm0, xmm6;       
00847 
00849                 movaps [ edx+48 ], xmm0;
00850         };
00851         return d;
00852 #else
00853         MMat4x4 d;
00854         
00855         float *a = _data;
00856         float *b = mat._data;
00857         float *dst = d._data;
00858 
00859     dst[ 0] = a[ 0]*b[ 0] + a[ 1]*b[ 4] + a[ 2]*b[ 8] + a[ 3]*b[12];
00860     dst[ 1] = a[ 0]*b[ 1] + a[ 1]*b[ 5] + a[ 2]*b[ 9] + a[ 3]*b[13];
00861     dst[ 2] = a[ 0]*b[ 2] + a[ 1]*b[ 6] + a[ 2]*b[10] + a[ 3]*b[14];
00862     dst[ 3] = a[ 0]*b[ 3] + a[ 1]*b[ 7] + a[ 2]*b[11] + a[ 3]*b[15];
00863 
00864     dst[ 4] = a[ 4]*b[ 0] + a[ 5]*b[ 4] + a[ 6]*b[ 8] + a[ 7]*b[12];
00865     dst[ 5] = a[ 4]*b[ 1] + a[ 5]*b[ 5] + a[ 6]*b[ 9] + a[ 7]*b[13];
00866     dst[ 6] = a[ 4]*b[ 2] + a[ 5]*b[ 6] + a[ 6]*b[10] + a[ 7]*b[14];
00867     dst[ 7] = a[ 4]*b[ 3] + a[ 5]*b[ 7] + a[ 6]*b[11] + a[ 7]*b[15];
00868 
00869     dst[ 8] = a[ 8]*b[ 0] + a[ 9]*b[ 4] + a[10]*b[ 8] + a[11]*b[12];
00870     dst[ 9] = a[ 8]*b[ 1] + a[ 9]*b[ 5] + a[10]*b[ 9] + a[11]*b[13];
00871     dst[10] = a[ 8]*b[ 2] + a[ 9]*b[ 6] + a[10]*b[10] + a[11]*b[14];
00872     dst[11] = a[ 8]*b[ 3] + a[ 9]*b[ 7] + a[10]*b[11] + a[11]*b[15];
00873 
00874     dst[12] = a[12]*b[ 0] + a[13]*b[ 4] + a[14]*b[ 8] + a[15]*b[12];
00875     dst[13] = a[12]*b[ 1] + a[13]*b[ 5] + a[14]*b[ 9] + a[15]*b[13];
00876     dst[14] = a[12]*b[ 2] + a[13]*b[ 6] + a[14]*b[10] + a[15]*b[14];
00877     dst[15] = a[12]*b[ 3] + a[13]*b[ 7] + a[14]*b[11] + a[15]*b[15];
00878 
00879         return d;
00880 #endif
00881 }

00883 //----------------------------------------------------------
00884 bool
00885 MMat4x4::IsIdentity() const
00886 {
00887         bool ident =     ApproxEqual( _data[  0 ], 1.0f );
00888         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  1 ], 0.0f );
00889         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  2 ], 0.0f );
00890         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  3 ], 0.0f );
00891 
00892         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  4 ], 0.0f );
00893         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  5 ], 1.0f );
00894         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  6 ], 0.0f );
00895         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  7 ], 0.0f );
00896 
00897         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  8 ], 0.0f );
00898         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[  9 ], 0.0f );
00899         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[ 10 ], 1.0f );
00900         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[ 11 ], 0.0f );
00901 
00902         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[ 12 ], 0.0f );
00903         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[ 13 ], 0.0f );
00904         ident = ident && ApproxEqual( _data[ 14 ], 0.0f );
00905         return  ident && ApproxEqual( _data[ 15 ], 1.0f );
00906 }
